tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceFeeds (
  feed_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  feed_name VARCHAR(100),
  threat_type VARCHAR(50),
  indicator VARCHAR(255),
  confidence_level INT,
  published_date DATE,
  source VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE threat_intel_feeds (
  feed_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feed_name VARCHAR(255),
  threat_type VARCHAR(100),
  threat_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE threat_detection (
  detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  detection_time TIMESTAMP,
  threat_level VARCHAR(50),
  threat_source VARCHAR(100),
  feed_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (feed_id) REFERENCES threat_intel_feeds(feed_id)
)

CREATE TABLE threat_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    feed_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (feed_id) REFERENCES threat_intelligence_feeds(feed_id)
);

CREATE TABLE threat_mitigations (
    mitigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES threat_events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES mitigation_actions(action_id)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    event_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE threat_intelligence_feeds (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    feed_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    threat_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    threat_level INT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE detections (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_id INT REFERENCES indicators(id),
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    threat_score INT NOT NULL,
    is_mitigated BOOLEAN
);
